info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Alkyd Traffic Paint is a quick-drying, alkyd-based marking paint with excellent adhesion and durability.

info.title: PRINCIPAL USES
info.body: It is designed for use on street markings, curbs, and other areas where traffic lanes and safety zones are marked.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Concrete Surfaces
info.body: Allow new concrete to dry for 14-28 days under normal weather conditions before painting. Remove oil and grease by using detergents or degreasers. Painting over roughened concrete surfaces is recommended to improve adhesion of succeeding coats.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.body: 1st coat: BOYSEN®® Epoxy Primer White B‑2200 (diluted with 1:1 Epoxy Reducer B‑55) 2nd & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Alkyd Traffic Paint (in any desired color)
